item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I’m Talhah Peerbhai. I’m one of those geeky guys who are passionate about Computer and Electronic systems. This site is just a sort of side project for me to blog about some of my experiences and to improve my writing skills. If you think I just sit in front of a computer all day there’s no need to worry because I also enjoy athletics and have represented my school in Diamond league!
